channel.title: 短篇 on Regina
channel.description: Recent content in 短篇 on Regina

item.title: Eat to Beat Disease
item.description: What should be added into my diet : Cancer-fighting defense system : soy bean or fermented soy products / broccoli (1 and 2 cups a week) Ability to repair and regenerate : a cup of cocoa Health-giving bacteria : fruit / sauerkraut / cheese Immune system : white button mushroom / virgin olive oil DNA protection : nuts (10g per day) / berries Moderate drinking / Spicy food / Hard cheese is OK References > Version Control Version Action Time 1.0 Init 2019-06-06
